name: Red Teal Purple: An Eye of the Tiger Side Story
name_original: Red Teal Purple: An Eye of the Tiger Side Story
description:
Arrow keys - Move 

Z key - Confirm 

X key - Cancel / Menu

        There are many things in this world that are past the realm of things that we can know. The dragons are old gods that dream so many thing, they know the world and they dream it. In this dream you are a pawn but soon you will be the controller and they will be the pawn.

        You must go but and fight the dragons to become the new leader of the world and safe the world from the dragon's wraith

        Can Ray and Grea save the worlds from the forever dream of the dragon god?
